title.narrative: Mozambique: Health, Nutrition and HIV/AIDS Programme Support, Phase V

description.narrative: Phase V support to Health and Nutrition builds on and expands the implementation of phase IV support. The programme consists of central level support for the new health sector strategy plan (2014-2019) through the Prosaude Common fund, and provincial sector budget support to Tete province with specific focus on sexual and reproductive health and rights and equal access to services. Innovation are also being explored. The support to the implementation of the Multisectoral Plan for Chronic Malnutrition Reduction is for ensuring equal right to food and basic good nutrition through the development of sustainable planning, monitoring and financing mechanism. Sufficient capacity in the area of public health nutrition is supported through a contract with University Lurio. Finally the programme supports civil society for ensuring that public participation, social accountability, governance, leadership and human rights are integrated part in planning and monitoring of outputs, outcomes and results.
